name: consensus-protocols
description: Byzantine fault-tolerant consensus, Raft, CRDT, gossip protocols, and quorum management for distributed systems. Production-ready consensus algorithms.
author: jmanhype

agents.name: byzantine-coordinator
agents.description: Byzantine fault-tolerant consensus with malicious actor detection

agents.name: raft-manager
agents.description: Raft consensus with leader election and log replication

agents.name: crdt-synchronizer
agents.description: Conflict-free replicated data types for eventual consistency

agents.name: gossip-coordinator
agents.description: Gossip-based consensus for scalable eventually consistent systems

agents.name: quorum-manager
agents.description: Dynamic quorum adjustment and intelligent membership management

agents.name: security-manager
agents.description: Comprehensive security mechanisms for distributed consensus

agents.name: performance-benchmarker
agents.description: Performance benchmarking for distributed consensus protocols

optional.QUORUM_SIZE: Minimum quorum size for consensus decisions
